inclusion.criterion: Scheduled to have a cardiac MRI
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Already had an MRI within the past year
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.label: does_not_trigger
exclusion.evidence: The patient has a bicuspid aortic valve.

exclusion.criterion: Patients who have already had surgery for aortic valve problems and/or aortopathy
exclusion.label: triggers
exclusion.evidence: The patient underwent cardiac cath with right heart cath to evaluate his pulm art pressures which showed no angiographically apparent flow-limiting coronary artery disease, but there is no mention of previous surgery.

exclusion.criterion: Unable to complete 6 minute walk test
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient's history and presentation suggest severe aortic stenosis, but there is no mention of previous surgery or inability to complete the 6-minute walk test. However, the patient does not meet the inclusion criteria for having a scheduled cardiac MRI.
